snippet: A federal grand jury has issued a subpoena as part of a continuing investigation into the practices and legality of the booming unregulated daily fantasy sports industry, according to two people involved in the industry.
abstract: Fantasy Sports Trade Assn, lobbying group for fantasy websites like DraftKings and FanDuel, is served with subpoena by federal grand jury regarding investigation into legality of pastime some view as gambling; organization represents around 300 members.
lead_paragraph: A federal grand jury has issued a subpoena as part of a continuing investigation into the practices and legality of the booming unregulated daily fantasy sports industry, according to two people involved in the industry.

headline.main: Fantasy Sports Trade Group Is Said to Receive Subpoena
headline.print_headline: Fantasy Sports Trade Group Is Subpoenaed by Federal Grand Jury
